long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Echo Translation - Real-Time Audio Translator
EchoDolphin is a powerful Chrome extension that translates any audio playing in your browser into the language of your choice. Whether you're watching videos, attending webinars, or listening to podcasts, EchoDolphin seamlessly bridges language gaps, enabling a fully immersive experience.

Key Features:

Real-Time Translation: Instantly translates browser audio into your preferred language.
Wide Language Support: Choose from a variety of languages to match your needs.
Simple Setup: Easy-to-use interface for hassle-free translation.
Versatile Usage: Works on any audio content from your browser, including streaming platforms, online classes, and live events.
How to Get Started:

Visit https://echoaudiotranslation.com to set up your account and download the extension.
Install the Chrome extension and select your desired language.
Start playing audio, and Echo Translation will handle the rest!
Transform your online audio experience with Echo Translation today! üåç‚ú®
